price: Ni ho rero hirya y’igisagara, hava umuntu aje anyaragasa, inyuma y’aho yumviye ko hari umugambi wo kwica nya Ntumwa canke kuzihana, araheza abwira ba bantu bo mu gacimbiri abinginga ati: “Emwe bantu banje! Enda nyabuna rero, nimukurikire Intumwa mwarungikiwe n’Imana Allah;
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

meta.transliteration: wajāa min aqṣā al-madīnati rajulun yasʿā qāla yāqawmi ittabiʿū al-mur'salīna
